bibl.title: Old Testament Prototypes for the Hermetic Trishagion in Poimandres 31- and Support for an Old Conjecture.
bibl.note: The opening of the Hermetic Trishagion can be emended, with the help of a papyrus [B.K.T. VI, 6, 1 (= van Haelst 722; LDAB 5201)], to show that it evokes the ancient interpretation of YHWH as ""I am that I am"" and also the biblical ""Lord of Hosts"". - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Ola Wikander, Old Testament Prototypes for the Hermetic Trishagion in Poimandres 31- and Support for an Old Conjecture.

The opening of the Hermetic Trishagion can be emended, with the help of a papyrus [B.K.T. VI, 6, 1 (= van Haelst 722; LDAB 5201)], to show that it evokes the ancient interpretation of YHWH as ""I am that I am"" and also the biblical ""Lord of Hosts"". - Avec résumé en anglais.
